entities.name: bludger
entities.description: The Bludger is a magical object that comes pelting back for a second attack.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who swerves out of the way to avoid the Bludger's attack.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is a person who thinks Harry is attacking him.

entities.name: snitch
entities.description: The Snitch is a magical object that Harry feels his fingers close on.

entities.name: broom
entities.description: Harry's broom is the one he uses to fly and later falls off of.

relationships.description: The Bludger comes pelting back for a second attack, aiming at Harry's face.
Malfoy thinks Harry is attacking him.
Harry feels his fingers close on the cold Snitch.
With a splattering thud he hit the mud and rolled off his broom.
